thread.section_title: Citadines Les Halles Paris - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: In the heart of things
thread.title_full: In the heart of things - Review of Citadines Les Halles Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: margarethP6097IU
title: In the heart of things
text:
Excellent hotel in a very lively area. 5 Minutes from Metro and RER. Many great dining options outside the door. Great bakery and grocery right there. Walking to Notre Dame and close to 72 Bus line that takes you along the Seine to Louvre and Eiffel Tower. Room as shown on site, fully equipped. Beds comfortable but bathroom small. Exceptional staff. Note there is street noise at night from streetside restaurants. Would go back in an instant.
Room Tip: Sleeps four very comfortably, twin beds in bedroom and twin bed hide-a bed. Comfortable. See more room tips
